data.description: OO Abstraction for SAP BC Interface
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Well - lets break it (SAP::BC::XMLRFC) down into 3 levels: 1) SAP -
    all modules relating to SAP R/3 and R/2 product interfaces 2) BC -
    modules relating to the SAP Business Connector 3) XMLRFC - provision
    of an OO interface to perform SOAP like calls to the SAP Business
    Connector

    This relates directly to a previous module of mine - SAP::Rfc which
    is an interface to SAPs generic proprietary RFC protocol.
